concept.title: Operational Attributes
concept.shortdesc: Operational Attributes are implicit attributes created by TokenScript Engine

conbody.p: Operational Attributes are implicit attributes created by . They are created for Tokens as well as .
For Ethereum tokens, the most important Operational Attribute is ownerAddress, whose value is the Ethereum address of the token's owner.

Other operational attributes being proposed (probably will be included in future TokenScript specifictions) includes:
createTimestamp
createBlockHeight
receiveTimeStamp
